name: FrosVelgrmon
effect: [When Digivolving] Trash the top digivolution card of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, return 1 of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards to its owner's hand.[Opponent's Turn] All of your opponent's Digimon gain "[When Attacking] Trash the bottom digivolution card of this Digimon."
